Price: $55.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:23:26 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Merry Christmas

Set of 6 Christmas candy pathway light with stakes outdoor decorations (8 modes).

Product Feature Set of 6 pack candy cane for large space 8 switchable light modes Timer (8 hours on and 16 hours off cycle) Pre-installed, easy to use Stable quality and long service life

Christmas Candy Cane Light with Stakes (Set of 12) Product specifications

Quantity: Set of 6

Size: 15.7″ H x 7.1″ W (wwithout the stakes)

Light Modes: 8 different modes

LED color: Warm white

Waterproof: Yes

Scalable: Yes

Package included

Candy light x 6 ( Pre-connect )

Stakes x 6

Manual x 1

Christmas Decorations Outdoor Yard

IP44 waterproof performance, suitable for decoration of various outdoor places, such as yard, store entrances, schools, etc.

Christmas Tree Ornaments

You can use it as a special Christmas tree ornament, the decoration effect is great.

Christmas Hanging Decors

You can also hang the candy cane lights under the window with other Christmas light.

【8 Modes Set of 6 Pathway Candy Light Stakes】Candy outdoor landscape lights have 8 adjustable light modes–Mixed, Waves, Seouential, Slo-glo, Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle, Steady on. You can choose the lighting mode that you like at any time to create a beautiful Christmas.
【Waterproof for Outdoor Christmas Decor】Our Christmas candy lights are made of UL-certified high-quality LED lights and plastics, ensuring that outdoor pathway lights can withstand any weather, such as rain and snow. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use, safer to use and touch.
【Timer & Easy to Install】Long press the timing switch to enter cycle timing mode (8 hours on and 16 hours off cycle). The sturdy Christmas pathway lights are very simple to install. You only need to insert the stakes into the soft ground, or hang them on the tree, window, Christmas tree or wall. Light up the whole Christmas.
【Size &Package】The set includes 6 x candy light, 6 x ground stake and 1x power adapter. Each cane is about 16” height(including stake), 7.1” width, interval between the candy cane stake is 20”, and the total length is 18 FT. The best Christmas decorations for outdoor or indoor.
【Perfect for Celebrate Christmas】Christmas is coming! These candy lights are very suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, such as pathway, walkways, front yard, driveway, flowerbed, patio, garden, lawn, entrance, wall, windows, Christmas tree, party, creating joyful Christmas atmosphere.

Merry Christmas

Set of 6 Christmas candy pathway light with stakes outdoor decorations (8 modes).

Read more

  • Timer (8 hours on and 16 hours off cycle)
  • Pre-installed, easy to use
  • Stable quality and long service life

Price: $30.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:24 UTC – Details)

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Product Description

Specification:

Size: 4*3.6*6Ft (length*width*height)Leading Wire length: 9FtTether length: 10FtMaterial: Inflatable: IP44 waterproof polyester，water bag: PVCProduct color: brown mainlyProduct element: Gingerbread Man + Christmas Hat + Christmas Candy CaneNumber of LED lights: 2Lighting mode: steady onLighting color: cool whitePower supply: plug (12V-1A)

Package Includes: 1 x Christmas Gingerbread Man Inflatable 4 x Plastic ground stakes 3 x Long Tethers 1 x water bag 2 x Built-in LED Lights 1 x Adapter 1 x Built-in Blower 1 x Manual

[ Inflatable Christmas Gingerbread Man Decorations ] A Fun for 6 Ft tall sitting Christmas Inflatable Gingerbread Man with Christmas hat, holding a candy cane in his left hand. Includes an inflatable, 4 ground stakes, 3pcs 10ft tethers and 1 water bag, a plug and built-in fan.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ Light up Xmas Decor ] The Christmas inflatable Gingerbread Man with 2 LED lights built inside, light up your yard and lawn at nights. Bringing your family, neighbors and guests endless surprises and joy.
[ Fast Inflation ] With 1A built-in fan and 12V adapter with UL certification. Fully self inflates in minutes with built-in fan after plug into a standard electrical outlet. After the parties, just unplug the Christmas decor and fold it up for storage and reuse. An zipper at the bottom of inflatables for fast deflation.
[ Stability and Sturdiness ] Come with water bag, tethers and stakes. Simply fill the water bag with sand or water and put it into the inflatables. And use the stakes and tethers to fix it when used outdoor ground. Made of waterproof polyester fiber, which is not easy to fade and damage.
[ Christmas Party Decorations ] The Christmas decoration is festival and cute. Suitable for Christmas outdoor decoration, yard, lawn, garden, etc.

Read more

4.8 out of 5 stars

Release date January 30, 2022
Manufacturer Dolphin Hat Games

Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:20:35 UTC – Details)


Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman is the Christmas themed edition of our wildly popular part game Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza!
HOLIDAY VERSION OF OUR WILDLY POPULAR PARTY GAME- Perfect for all-ages.
PLAY IT ANY TIME ANY PLACE- Convenient take anywhere size game.
SIMPLE AND HILARIOUS- Fast paced laugh out loud fun for any get together.
GET ROLLING IN SECONDS- Takes only a minute to learn and gameplay lasts for about 10 to 15 minutes.
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR FAMILY FESTIVITIES- Game night merriment

What’s Included:

  • Instructions
  • 55 regular character cards
  • 3 Reindeer special cards
  • 3 Drums special cards
  • 3 Silent Night special cards
  • 3-8 players
  • 8 years and up
  • 10 min Playing time

Playing Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman will be a night of merriment!

Bu don’t just take our word for it

“We have the taco, cat, goat cheese, pizza game and LOVE it so we knew this one would be perfect for Christmas. And we LOVE it!!!”

“I’ve purchased this game as a stocking stuffer for my 9-year-old. She and the rest of the family enjoy the game a lot. It’s a simple game that “tests” your memory and reactiveness. The drawings on cards are pretty adorable. A round of game is fairly short, so it works well when you’re busy but your child wants to play a game with you.”

-Amazon Customers

Read more

Play and Say!

Play a card while saying the next word in Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman

Slap!

If it’s a match! The last person to slap takes all the cards

Actions!

To win this holiday game, you’ll need to show your reindeer antlers, drum the table, or “Shh!” for silent night.

Read more
